sulu_media.click_here_to_upload: or click here to upload files
sulu_media.remove_collection_warning: This operation deletes a collection and cannot be undone. Do you really wish to proceed?
sulu_media.delete_media_warning_text: This operation deletes a media and cannot be undone. Do you really wish to proceed?
sulu_media.delete_preview_image_warning_: This operation deletes the preview image and cannot be undone. Do you really wish to proceed?
sulu_media.upload_server_error: There was an error while uploading one or multiple files to the server.
sulu_media.file_upload_error: The file could not be uploaded to the server. This might be caused by a filesize limit for uploads on the server.
sulu_media.upload_file_not_found: The uploaded file was not found on the server. This might be caused by a filesize limit for uploads on the server.
sulu_media.upload_exceeds_max_filesize: The uploaded file exceeds the configured maximum filesize.
sulu_media.upload_filetype_blocked: The filetype of the uploaded file is configured to be blocked.
sulu_media.double_click_crop_and_maximiz: A double-click maximizes and centers the area
sulu_media.delete_collection_dependant_w: {1}Are you sure that you also want to delete one subcollection or media?|]1,Inf[Are you sure that you also want to delete %count% subcollection or media?
sulu_activity.description.collections.mo: {userFullName} has moved the collection "{resourceTitle}" from "{context_previousParentTitle}" to "{context_newParentTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.collections.tr: {userFullName} has added a translation "{resourceLocale}" to the collection "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.media.moved: {userFullName} has moved the media "{resourceTitle}" from "{context_previousCollectionTitle}" to "{context_newCollectionTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.media.translat: {userFullName} has added a translation "{resourceLocale}" to the media "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.media.crop_mod: {userFullName} has changed the crop for the "{context_formatKey}" format of the media "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.media.crop_rem: {userFullName} has removed the crop for the "{context_formatKey}" format from the media "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.media.preview_: {userFullName} has changed the preview image of the media "{resourceTitle}"
{userFullName} has removed the preview image from the media "{resourceTitle}"
sulu_activity.description.media.version_: {userFullName} has added a new version for the media "{resourceTitle}"
{userFullName} has removed a version from the media "{resourceTitle}"
